lenders.name: Debra Marrs
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit. I believe everyone should have access to the finances to build their dream, support their families, and achieve success.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to write their life stories. But more importantly, I teach them how to share their stories with others through various means of publishing. You have a story to tell too.  Write it if you can, or share with your children so they can learn from you.

lenders.name: Chris & Jon
lenders.loan_because: If we all help a little, we can achieve amazing results!
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoying retirement...

lenders.name: Gavin and Daria
lenders.loan_because: we still believe we can all make a difference. Kiva makes us feel that the connection is more tangible and that the group we belong to can  show that morality, compassion and community are not only a religious domain.
lenders.occupational_info:
Gavin works for a computer software company that believes technology can help people reach their potential. He works in an area called Business Intelligence that helps companies report on and analyse their data to better understand their business.
Daria works as a training coordinator for case workers in refugee resettlement.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have been brought up in a family that believes in giving back.  When we build bridges among caring, capable people, we make lives and the world a better place than we found it. I am blessed to be an entrepreneur and own my own successful business.  I want to loan to help others be successful in their businesses as well.  In addition, through participating in this program, I can continue to pass the legacy of giving on to my son.  We talk and decide together who to give loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a business transformation and personal productivity consultant & coach and founder of Calahan Solutions, Inc.  I work with intelligent, highly motivated, busy entrepreneurs, producers and other professionals to teach them how to do more with their time, space and information. I believe life is meant to be lived and that fabulous vision combined with practical systems can make that happen very quickly. I help small businesses develop and implement systems that allow them to take their businesses to the next level and help them unleash their profit potential.

I write regularly on 2 of my blogs as well as a number of industry blogs.  I founded www.LearnFromOrganizingExperts.com to support others in my industry to grow and develop their businesses.  In addition, I have authored many programs including "Find In Five Seconds" and the "D.A.R.T." system among others.

I frequently speak at conferences and workshops about business and personal productivity and how to create massive business success through systems and simplification.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to have more than what I need and want to make a difference in  the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in technology sector.

lenders.loan_because: When i grew up, my mother and father tough me that, if you are fortunate enough to have a decent life, you should share with the ones who are not as fortunate as you are, so here i am ! My mother and father are now retired and approaching 80 years old and they still do community work. This is to show you that giving is like anything else, You learn it by seeing others do the same.  If you learn it at a young age, you will do it all your life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm am an investment advisor / stock broker.  I'm helping peoples investing their money in a usefull way for their future and the future of their loved ones.

lenders.occupational_info: I work very hard on a commercial crab boat and study hard in school when I am not out at sea.  I want to do great things one day and become a successful person like my father.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending is affordable and simple to do.  Its an easy way to help others with a hand up with minimal time or effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I work primarily using a therapeutic approach called Somatic Experiencing (SE) which uses body awareness (mindfulness) to heal trauma.  SE is very compatible with other mindfulness based practices.

lenders.name: Nekisha-Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
It is my greatest joy to live the bible as it says, I will be able to lend to many nations and not borrow.  It makes me feel great knowing that I am assisting someone to live their dreams.  I don't believe in struggle and it is a pleasure to do what  I can to help my beautiful sisters across the world end their personal struggle and increase their self worth and self-esteem. 

 I know God is well pleased and I can sleep with a smile on my face.  Whenever I have a need God meets my need but He always uses people to do it.  So it is God using me to meet the needs of those who need the resources that I am fortunate to have.  I am grateful and blessed to do it.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help women take control of their life by providing life coaching.  What I do is get an accurate understanding of the problems that a woman is having in her life.  It could be money, self-esteem, love, relationships, weight or jobs.  I help her figure out what to do so she can over come it and start to live her  best situatuion and creating her best life with out struggle, depression, fear and poverty.  I  talk to these women that I coach  through phone conversations which allows me to have clients worldwide.  

I wrote a book to help the women understand what they can do to help themselves without personal coaching with me.  I get to travel and do empowerment speaking as well.

I am also the radio talk show host of a weekly internet show called Living Vivaciously.  My show is located on http://www.latalkradio.com each Monday.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I have a hundred reasons, but this is my most favorite.  It makes me feel good that I am actually helping people and I get my money back after it.  I feel really good after I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I play and go to school.

lenders.name: Jakob
lenders.loan_because: I have spent quite some time traveling and living in developing countries and know that a (relatively) small amount of  money can make all the difference in the world to people with little resources.

lenders.name: Frankie

My pockets may not be the fullest, but in a very small way I share that want for betterment and people have helped me. I want to pass that on.

my wife just born a baby and i  don't enough  money to look after them.

very thanks.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: A defining moment for me was the year I finished High School (1966). A kind friend of my mother's gave to me in my greatest hour of need. You see,  I barely graduated high school because we didn't have the $68.00 needed to pay for school fees.  My family migrated to Chicago after my father died in Arkansas in 1955.  We grew up poor and had to depend on the welfare system for food and shelter.  We were a family of 11 in the southern tradition. It wasn't much but we ate and had a place to stay. We had a chance to better ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with special needs children instructing them in reading, math, and language arts.

3) Give back more than I take.

lenders.loan_because: I like to contribute to another persons dreams and hopes, and help make things better. Loaning through Kiva is a very practical way of dreaming of a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people and organizations to achieve their goals and ambitions,  both on a large and very small scale. I help them to structure their business in an efficient way and focus on their goals, and give them lots of creative ideas to work towards them.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: The Spirit within me honours the Spirit in you. It is my joy to assist  you. Thank you.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am blessed to be married to a wonderful lady. I have 3 beautiful children who are all married to wonderful people. God has greatly blessed me.
My job is to make sure all of the flight documentation is alright before an airplane flys, that the weather is alright to fly and that the crews are legal and safe. I love aviation and am blessed to work in a field that I enjoy.

lenders.name: Erin

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Well 4 reasons really. Firstly because it is a way of helping someone who needs a little help, secondly because it is not creating dependence and the same money can be rolled around and help lots of people. Thirdly because I am an atheist and know that God won't help them.... and the atheists are the biggest lending group..... that really pleases me. And finally and selfishly, it makes me feel really great to change someones life for the better without changing my own more than imperceptibly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large multinational electrical company, travel most of the time to all corners of the world to help in businesses that are in difficulties or want to improve their performance.

lenders.name: Tanja
lenders.loan_because: live your dreams

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I'm able and I like to help in anyway that I can.  I hope you do too!
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites and help increase web presence through marketing, PR and social media.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I'm not really wealthy but I;m blessed and lucky to be living the life I am.  Spread a little love :o)

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It enables me to make a positive impact and helps somebody in reaching their personal aims and become self-sufficient  - even by loaning small amounts.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.occupational_info: In my work I show teachers how to use the internet and other technologies, in their teaching.

lenders.loan_because: I'm able to

lenders.loan_because: This was a gift. It seems appropriate as i am a woman entrepreneur

lenders.loan_because: I like to help people and it's a way to keep on giving.

lenders.loan_because: We have so much we want to share.

lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for provides retirement plan services (administration, investments, communications, etc.) to companies who sponsor qualified retirement plans for their employees.

lenders.loan_because: We must help were we can.

lenders.loan_because: I think this might be one of the more effective ways of bringing this world to equal level.

lenders.occupational_info: We work for a large Telecom company in Canada. He is a technical engineer, she coordinates DSL orders for mid sized businesses

lenders.name: Hanna
lenders.loan_because: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.

lenders.name: Kevin Garnett
lenders.loan_because: I've been through the start-up gauntlet and know how hard it is to get capital.

lenders.name: Shailesh
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people. Together we can achieve more.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: I believe people helping themselves is more effective than handouts.  I also wanted my son to see that helping people feels good and is worthwhile.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.occupational_info: enabling a sustainable future

lenders.name: Dmitri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others in need when they genuinely want to improve their life or lives of those around them with action. I was referred to Kiva.org by Bill Clinton at one of the powerwithin events.
lenders.occupational_info: project management consultant, looking for ways to help improve project management practice around the world, working on it one step at a time.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I am Catholic and I am tithing. God Bless you.

lenders.name: Osteoderm
lenders.loan_because: I can. Anyone who can afford to loan should do so, and everyone who has just a little "extra money" can certainly afford it.
lenders.occupational_info: I build and repair things that require building and repairing.

lenders.name: Maya
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to make this world a better place for everybody.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to learn

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with an entrepreneural spirit fulfill their dreams of building a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world. No matter how small.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: the life I am living has a lot to do with where I was born and into the family I was born. Micro-finance allows me an opportunity to provide on the ground life-changing loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Education

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I'm a passionate entrepreneur and I love helping other to succeed in their projects.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people promote their businesses through Online Marketing.

lenders.name: andrew
lenders.loan_because: I visited Peru  in 2005 and saw the hardworking people at their markets.  I enjoyed their tasty vegetables in their country markets and thought the people were gentle and kind.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a car and truck rental business in Brisbane Australia.  People pay me for the use of the truck or car for a short time while they transport goods in the truck for go for a short trip in one of the cars.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: You need it, I have it, how can I not?

lenders.loan_because: the inspiration  these entrepreneurs are to me

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: Each person is his own master. Governments are here to serve us but they don't, so it's time for each one of us  to take his life in his hand. LOVE
lenders.occupational_info: learning to grow food, to live in community, to meditate. To live.

lenders.name: Ola
lenders.loan_because: I'd wish someone would lend me money if I vere to find myself in a tight spot.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, you feed him for a lifetime." I loan because I want to give people a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a teacher in the beautiful state of Jalisco, Mexico.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are here on this earth to help other people and I love helping others.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: It is a beautiful thing!

lenders.name: Heath
lenders.loan_because: I think there are alot of good people out there in tough times. When we think we have it bad there are others whom really have it worse and I think that  having more than I need puts me in a position to help someone get to a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate car crashes in which someone either dies or is seriously injured. I also investigate alcohol/drug impaired driving crimes.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I live in America.  I have a flush toilet, a hot shower, and freedom; what else do I need?  Oh, yeah: a bike!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's good to give something back. I wouldn't have this opportunity if I hadn't been helped.
lenders.occupational_info: I design brand identities, logos, websites, brochures and other advertising materials.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to live in a world where it isn't a situation of longatud or latitude that causes poverty.  I want to live in a world where we can share resources.  A world where love transends nationality, colour, class and creed
lenders.occupational_info: I do general plumbing for a city firm

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: .. this is the better way to really help people.
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of the large customers of my employer in Bavaria and Austria.

lenders.name: Sitha
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I want to buy a car so I can have my own taxi to cater the
tourist and put up a small grocery store.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work is very challenging. I have to
chase the passanger so that I can
compete the other taxi driver. I will make a small store for other kind of business. I need to survive myelf being an orphan. The money that i will receive from the loan I will first put in the bank while I start my store and cater the tourist in our province as well.
